messages.subject: Britannica.com
messages.msgSnippet: I love this site.  It s great for unschoolers. ... John http://members.xoom.com/joandersen
messages.messageBody:
I love this site. It's great for unschoolers.



> ---------------------
> Britannica.com is a free knowledge and learning center for people
> who seek thoughtful and engaging context to today's affairs. Only
> Britannica.com lets users simultaneously search the world's most
> respected encyclopedia, expert reviews of the Web's best sites,
> timely articles from international magazines, and related books.
> Daily Explore features and spotlights from Britannica.com's expert
> editorial staff extend these unique encyclopedic resources, putting
> information in context and offering broad and deep knowledge
> of the world.
>
> ---------------------
> To subscribe, visit http://www.britannica.com/newsletters.
> To unsubscribe, reply to this note with the word "unsubscribe"
> in the subject line, or send a blank e-mail message to this address:
> site.of.the.day-off@....
>

John
http://members.xoom.com/joandersen

messages.subject: Britannica.com
messages.msgSnippet: Have you seen the Britannica website (http://www.britannica.com/)?  It s fabulous.  The entire encyclopedia is on there.  Another amazing feature is the
messages.messageBody:
Have you seen the Britannica website (http://www.britannica.com/)? It's
fabulous. The entire encyclopedia is on there. Another amazing feature is
the website reviews on a vast range of subjects.

I'm making it my browser's default home page. It's that good.

John Andersen
http://members.xoom.com/joandersen
